name: Thistle and Yew
flavor_text: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

frame.name: Precision Frame
frame.description: This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

perks.description:
Ocular sights. Long zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Mark 10 Glass
